issue.title: www.neoseeker.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.neoseeker.com/clair-obscur-expedition-33/walkthrough](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.neoseeker.com%2Fclair-obscur-expedition-33%2Fwalkthrough) ### Comment > The website has introduced multiple new advertisements that somewhat bypass AdGuard filtering. > > These ads appear in side banners, within articles content, and at the top of pages as empty frames. > > Additionally, when AdGuard is enabled, I am unable to click hyperlinks or navigate between pages. ``` Username: @Kobi-Blade ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/7fnodyp261kw8kkg84wwo0k88wwk0c0q6ll1aaw6rk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/tidyh9p429cs8kwwgc0sso4k0go80s0pnhbvuh396s.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.2 (5228) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.19045.0` Browser: | Edge License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Other Annoyances Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Assistant (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js)`
`AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | `N/A` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.2+%285228%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.19045.0&browser=edge&filters=2.3.18.19.21&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Assistant%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fassistant%252F4.3%252Fassistant.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=AdGuard%2520DNS%2520Filter%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=false&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=true&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=0&dns.fallback_mode=System&stealth.disable_windows_recall=true)
